trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= button>" name="<input type= button>" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= submit>" name="<input type= submit>" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= reset>" name="<input type= reset>" href=""></xref> elements on the server.
trans-unit.target: Tillater programmatisk tilgang til HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= button>" name="<input type= button>" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= submit>" name="<input type= submit>" href=""> </xref>, og <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= reset>" name="<input type= reset>" href=""> </xref> elementer på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlInputButton class to create button controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Bruk klassen HtmlInputButton til å opprette kontrollene på en webside.

trans-unit.source: An `<input type=button>` HTML element is a push button with no default behavior when clicked.
trans-unit.target: En `<input type=button>` HTML-elementet er en knapp med ingen standard virkemåte når du klikker.

trans-unit.source: An `<input type=submit>` HTML element is a button that submits a form when clicked.
trans-unit.target: En `<input type=submit>` HTML-elementet er en knapp som sender et skjema når du klikker.

trans-unit.source: An `<input type=reset>` HTML button resets all controls to their initial values when clicked.
trans-unit.target: En `<input type=reset>` HTML-knappen tilbakestiller alle kontroller til de opprinnelige verdiene når du klikker.

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 2.0, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> class to create Reset and Submit buttons, respectively.
trans-unit.target: I ASP.NET 2.0, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>klassen og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>klassen for å opprette tilbakestilling og Send knappene henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputButton, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av HtmlInputButton, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> klasse bruker standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>|The "button" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>| "Button" strenglitteral. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> class using the specified button type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte knapp-typen.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>|The value of the `type` parameter.| The following table shows the different possible values for the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>| Verdien for den `type` parameteren. | Tabellen nedenfor viser forskjellige mulige verdier for den `type` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`button`|A command button.| |`submit`|A button that submits the form to the server.| |`reset`|A button that clears the form.|
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `button`| Kommando. | | `submit`| En knapp som sender skjemaet til serveren. | | `reset`| En knapp som fjerner skjemaet. |

trans-unit.source: The input button type.
trans-unit.target: Inndata knappetypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringen utføres når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Som standard siden valideringen utføres når en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: Siden validering bestemmer om inndata kontrollene som er tilknyttet en validering kontroll på siden med alle bestod valideringsregler som er angitt av kontrollen validering.

trans-unit.source: You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked by using the CausesValidation property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi eller fastslå om validering er utført på både klienten og serveren når en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontrollen klikkes ved hjelp av egenskapen CausesValidation.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the CausesValidation property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at godkjenningen fra utført egenskapen CausesValidation til `false`.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis i hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>hendelse for å forhindre siden validering skjer når en Avbryt eller Reset knapp klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> control is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis valideringen utføres når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> kontrollen er klikket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*> event and registers client script for generating postback.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>hendelsen og registrerer klient-skript for å generere tilbakesending.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: OnPreRender is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to handle the event directly.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg behandle hendelsen direkte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event is raised when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A Reset button does not raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En Tilbakestill ikke heve den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>representant du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontroll, når den klikkes, opphøye en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>hendelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called using the group of controls specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden ved hjelp av gruppen med kontroller som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Renders the attributes into the specified writer and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser attributtene til den angitte writer og kaller deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes*>

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderAttributes overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.method.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: RenderAttributes is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: RenderAttributes brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar gjengitte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> control is clicked on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes på siden.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A Reset button does not raise the ServerClick event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A Tilbakestill ikke heve ServerClick-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RaisePostBackEvent*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RaisePostBackEvent*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RaisePostBackEvent*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents an optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer argument valgfrie hendelsen som skal sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gruppen med kontroller som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsgrupper kan du tilordne validering Kontroller på en side til en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: Hver valideringsgruppe kan valideres uavhengig fra andre valideringsgrupper på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ValidationGroup-egenskapen til å angi navnet på valideringsgruppen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontrollen får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har en effekt bare når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the ValidationGroup property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for egenskapen ValidationGroup bare valideringen kontrollerer som er en del av den angitte gruppen valideres når den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>kontrollen legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for this property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for egenskapen og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `true`, alle kontroller for validering på siden som ikke er tilordnet til en valideringsgruppe valideres når kontrollen legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen med kontroller som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton"> </xref> kontrollen får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng (""), som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.
